title: Episode 334: Chronicles of the Uncircumcised Pinky (Feat. Candiace Dillard Bassett)
itunes:title: Episode 334: Chronicles of the Uncircumcised Pinky (Feat. Candiace Dillard Bassett)
description:
Real Housewife of Potomac's, Candiace Dillard-Bassett joined the ladies of Lip Service this week to promote her latest album "Deep Space." The ladies are true fans of the show so they had an absolute blast with Candiace. We discussed Nicki Minaj on the reunion, as well as other beefs that have happened on the show, dealing with small/uncircumcised d*cks, trash excuses from men, and much more. Candiace even opens up about why she still uses condoms with her husband. Enjoy!
